item.title: build github pages hugo
item.description: How to build personal blog using github pages and Hugo # V2Ray Client # markdown：https://www.jianshu.com/p/q81RER https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LSJ5S8VG5aU https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=psyz4UPnGAA https://stilig.top/posts/building-hugo/#comments https://cuttontail.blog/blog/create-a-wesite-using-github-pages-and-hugo/ https://www.pseudoyu.com/en/2022/05/29/deploy_your_blog_using_hugo_and_github_action/ https://tomial.github.io/posts/hugo%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8github-action%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2%E5%88%B0github-pages/ https://herotofu.com/solutions/guides/hugo-contact-form https://www.sohu.com/a/222392651_661411 https://blowfish.page/docs/firebase-views/

item.title: How to convert a .ppk file to .pem file
item.description: We can use PuttyGen to do this. PuTTYgen is an key generator tool for creating SSH keys for PuTTY. Check more details about Putty here. Click Load (Load an existing private key file.

item.title: How to install LXDE on Ubuntu/Debian and control your Linux VPS remotely using xrdp
item.description: LXDE is a lightweight desktop environment for Linux. If you would like to have a graphical interface, especially on a low-budget VPS, LXDE is a good choice. For more details about LXDE, you can check its offical website here .
